hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
rm -rf ./* export WS=`pwd`
source /home/test/.bashrc #Install dependencies from repo sudo yum install -y git wget tar java-1.8.0-ibm java-1.8.0-ibm-devel ant dejavu-serif-fonts net-tools hostname
#Set JAVA_HOME export JAVA_HOME=/usr/lib/jvm/java-1.8.0-openjdk export PATH=$JAVA_HOME/bin:$PATH java -version
#Get Jmeter source cd $WS git clone https://github.com/apache/jmeter.git
#Get Jmeter binary wget https://archive.apache.org/dist/jmeter/binaries/apache-jmeter-4.0.tgz tar -xvzf apache-jmeter-4.0.tgz #rm $PWD/jmeter/bin/ApacheJMeter.jar cp -Rf $WS/apache-jmeter-4.0/bin/ApacheJMeter.jar $WS/jmeter/bin/
cd jmeter/ pwd git checkout v4_0 ant download_jars
#Comment out G1GC algorithm as it is unimplemented in OpenJDK zero cp bin/jmeter bin/jmeter.orig sed -i '178d' bin/jmeter sed -i '177a# : "${GC_ALGO:="-XX:+UseG1GC -XX:MaxGCPauseMillis=100 -XX:G1ReservePercent=20"}" ' bin/jmeter diff -u bin/jmeter.orig bin/jmeter || true
#Verify export PATH=$PATH:`pwd`/bin/ jmeter --version
cd $WS/apache-jmeter-4.0/ jmeter -n -t ./extras/Test.jmx -l Test.jtl cat Test.jtl
